verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
NYANYI PUJIAN BAGIMU TUHAN
PUJIAN BAGIMU TUHAN
NAMA-MU BESAR DAN LAYAK DI PUJI
NYANYI PUJIAN BAGIMU TUHAN
PUJIAN BAGIMU TUHAN
NAMA-MU BESAR DAN LAYAK DI PUJI

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
KUAGUNGKAN NAMA-MU TUHAN
AGUNG NAMA-MU TUHAN
NAMA-MU BESAR DAN LAYAK DI PUJI

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
I SING PRAISES TO YOUR NAME, OH LORD
PRAISES TO YOUR NAME, OH LORD
FOR YOUR NAME IS GREAT
AND WORTHY TO BE PRAISED
I SING PRAISES TO YOUR NAME, OH LORD
PRAISES TO YOUR NAME, OH LORD
FOR YOUR NAME IS GREAT
AND WORTHY TO BE PRAISED

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
I GIVE GLORY TO YOUR NAME, OH LORD
GLORY TO YOUR NAME, OH LORD
FOR YOUR NAME IS GREAT
AND WORTHY TO BE PRAISED
I GIVE GLORY TO YOUR NAME, OH LORD
GLORY TO YOUR NAME, OH LORD
FOR YOUR NAME IS GREAT
AND WORTHY TO BE PRAISED
